article: gold futures on the comex division of the new york mercantile exchange dropped for the second day on friday as the improved economic perspective as well as firm dollar reduced gold 's safe-haven appeal and the consumer sentiment index rose .
abstract: gold ends lower for second session on reduced safety demand rising consumer index
